snippet: Eric Eichelberger, a senior at Marist School in Atlanta, says he "could not be more ecstatic" to attend his dream college in the fall.
abstract: Eric Eichelberger, a senior at Marist School in Atlanta, says he "could not be more ecstatic" to attend his dream college in the fall.

headline.main: 'Even Though It Took Me All Year, I Wouldn't Change a Thing'
